products.description: City grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home. The steely character of the grey is softened by the sleek finishing and smooth surfaces of the wooden slats to create a homely addition that will enhance any space. Origin, city grey - venetian blind city grey combines contemporary design with an urban aesthetic to create a unique visual that takes pride of place in any room in the home.

products.title: Thermal Plus Misty Grey Energy Saving Roller Blind
products.description: Grey is the modern, warm neutral and with this thermal plus blind you can ensure your home stays even warmer while saving money. A special, pearlised coating on the blind keeps the heat in and the cold out, allowing you to spend less on your energy bills as well as cosy up a con grey is the modern, warm neutral and with this thermal plus blind you can ensure your home stays even warmer while saving money.

products.title: Ex-lite Pvc Blackout Light Grey 127mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Durable, waterproof and flame retardant, ex-lite pvc is an excellent fabric to create sleek and stylish window blinds in contemporary colours and beautiful designs. Ex-lite light grey is a warm grey shade. Great ofr bathrooms or kitchens. products.title: Loras Blackout Melody Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Loras blackout melody grey is an eye-catching electric roller blind that will add instant pretty appeal to your window of choice. With an electric operation system, it quickly opens and closes at the touch of a button. Featuring clusters of soft, white blossom and green leaves with bluebirds perching on branches its a serene design that will gain many compliments. This blind is made using a specialist blackout fabric so the light will stay firmly away when this blind is closed.

products.title: Whitby Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: For a smart and contemporary finish to any room, whitby blackout pvc stone grey electric blind in stone grey is an eye-popping display of a cityscape featuring simply drawn houses interspersed with leafy trees. Plus, it's made of moisture resistant fabric so it's easy to keep it clean. Product id: db-rbx1992 fabric colour: stone grey material: 29% pvc 71% fibreglass lining: white blackout backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes whitby pvc blackout stone grey roller blind in grey/brown.

products.title: Uniview 3200 Spectre Black/grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their spectre black / grey is a bold, modern choice.

products.title: Sio Charcoal 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Delicate yet dark and sophisticated, the sio charcoal vertical blind will make a decidedly glamorous addition to your space.
